file_content.text: Right on time. My friends have been looking forward to this.
I don't see anyone. Are they invisible, or very small?
They're an elusive bunch.
I'm already tired of waiting.
Don't bore me.
I hope our meeting goes well.
Me, too.
They're inside.
I just shot a former squadmate in the face. How do you feel about your chances?
You want to wind up like Vik?
I'm racking up quite the body count today.
Don't make me kill you, too.
Koth was right. We can't trust you.
Koth warned me about you.
You better have a good explanation.
What's the meaning of this?
Your droid is not a part of what must happen here.
I spent five years stuck in one trap. I won't fall into another.
You are free to leave whenever you like. But if you want the help of my allies, you'll stay.
We have come this far. Let us see where it leads.
No more games. Truth. Now.
Stop manipulating me.
You have one minute to impress me.
Convince me to stay, or else.
Don't betray me, Senya.
Don't make me regret this.
Before Arcann's betrayal, Zakuul was protected by two orders: the Knights, and Scions who see visions of the past and future.
Fate is a tale whispered to us by the Force. But the voices are silent about you. We must know why.
Or you could live like the rest of us and just wait and see.
Do you? Really?
The Force and I aren't on speaking terms.
The Force is overrated.
I've always wanted to know my future. How do we get these voices talking?
Sounds good to me.
Perhaps together we can reveal the future.
Let's work together.
You rely too heavily on these "voices." Feel my power. That's all you need to know.
Focus on my power.
Visions are only suggestions for the future. I'm defined by my actions in the present--not some foretold prophecy.
I don't believe in fate.
If we are to aid your rebellion, we must understand what role you play in Arcann's defeat.
I'll do what I have to.
So be it.
You aren't the first person who's wanted to test me.
I've been challenged before.
It sounds like you're planning to attack. That's a mistake.
Are you threatening me?
As will we.
This will be different.
We do what must be done.
I tie my fate to yours. I join you in these trials, come what may.
The Heart of Scyva is heavy with loss. In her pain, we lash out.
I do miss the old ways of Zakuul. Such mythology and pageantry.
Please defend yourselves.
Scions no longer serve Arcann. Whether they serve you will be determined now.
We will test you physically and spiritually to pierce the veil and see the truth.
I have one way of dealing with traitors.
Big mistake, Senya.
